name: Legends of Elendria: The Frozen Maiden
name_original: Legends of Elendria: The Frozen Maiden
description:
Promoting our new Collectible Card Game:

FREE DOWNLOAD and a Welcome pack!
http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/cabals-the-card-game/id463736980?mt=8
*****
[Expansion For Frozen Maiden is Here!!!]
It will feature totally new content, story and super cool features like Epic mount!
It will also fix the crashing bug.

Legends of Elendria: The Frozen Maiden:
Check out this Awesome RPG-TD!

Reviews from web-sites:
8/10 Pocket Gamer: "Unlike rival tower defence clones, this game will keep you thoroughly occupied for many days to come."

4/5 AppSafari: " With a storyline and RPG style leveling up, this game definitely stands out of the crowd."

8/10 Slide Gamer: "I enjoyed Legends of Elendria, it kept me on my toes and it was a well balanced game."

3/4 Slide to Play: "Legends of Elendria offers a well-made and deep tower defence experience."

Game:
The Frozen Maiden blends popular tower defence genre with role-playing elements. Unlock towers, skills and spells as you progress through the thrilling fantasy story!

Main game features:
* Several hours of gameplay
* Challenging and fun gameplay
* Four tower types, with unique upgrade options
* 14 different enemy types
* Dozens of different battlegrounds
* Fantasy story
* Role playing character progress
* Epic soundtrack.
* HARD MODE - The most challenging TD on iPhone
### Play through, We Challenge You! ###
